info.name: Cutemenus Classic Companion - Vacuum Places Imprvd
info.description:
This userstyle adds icons to all Vacuum Places Improved menuitems.
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/13878

This userstyle is meant to be used in conjunction with style 19372.

----------------

Some of these icons require the Cutemenus Classic addon located here:
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/4142

----------------
